content: Hi! I have a special offer for your business. Would you like more clients? Click my link for details.
Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. Can I help you schedule a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service today?
No, but if you want to DOUBLE your customers, visit our website now! Limited time only!
We only handle home service requests for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC jobs. If you have a service need, please let me know!
reason: Customer sent unsolicited promotional messages and did not request service.
